Text: Alamac Cc spoke with Kris Johnson of ReUse Technologies The Agreements that we have from McEwen re Ash and Coal Handling are the agreements in effect at his time The only exceptions are the Grice Brothers Coal Trucking Agreement at both plants Kris told me both trucking agreements had been terminated He is also faxing me a Consent Agreement dated that we do not have They are planning to be here tomorrow at in EB I have told them business casual I do not believe that they are bringing counsel Fred Reagan We need to get together today to talk about the meeting tomorrow

Draft Phase II report and tables Cc received the DRAFT phase II from ENSR Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Norris Roland NSRcom on PM To cc Tew Grant NSRcom Subject Draft Phase II report and tables Let us know if you have any questions thanks Phase II LSA Draft Reportdoc Elizabethtown GW Resultsxls ELIZABETHTOWN Soil Resultsxls Lumberton Soil Resultsxls railcar soil and GW resultsxls Lumberton GW Resultsxls Rusty Norris PE PLS RSM General Manager ENSR Consulting and Engineering NC Inc Wycliff Road Suite Raleigh North Carolina phone facsimile direct facsimile cellular phone email address The information contained in this communication is confidential and privileged proprietary information intended only for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed Any unauthorized use distribution copying or disclosure of this communication is prohibited If you have received this communication in error please contact the sender immediately It is our policy that emails are intended for and should be used for business purposes only This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses ENSR wwwensrcom Phase II LSA Draft Reportdoc Elizabethtown GW Resultsxls ELIZABETHTOWN Soil Resultsxls Lumberton Soil Resultsxls railcar soil and GW resultsxls Lumberton GW Resultsxls

STEAM PURCHASE AGT ELIZABETHTOWNdocYour Request Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Jay Sonnenberg on PM To cc Clark Thompson Subject STEAM PURCHASE AGT ELIZABETHTOWNdoc George Attached is a blacklined version of the Steam Purchase Agreement marked to show changes made in the latest draft against the draft The Ground Lease will follow Jay Jay Sonnenberg Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana St Suite Houston TX Ph Fax STEAMPURdoc

GROUND LEASE ELIZABETHTOWNdocthink that these are current but you might want to check with Steve Van Hooser to verify that there have been no changes Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Jay Sonnenberg on PM To cc Clark Thompson Subject GROUND LEASE ELIZABETHTOWNdoc George As requested attached are clean and blacklined versions of the latest draft of Ground Lease The blacklined is marked to show changes made to the draft Also although this draft does not contain the change note that in the definition for CPI the blank will be filled in with Atlanta Georgia Jay Jay Sonnenberg Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana St Suite Houston TX Ph Fax GROUNDLEdoc v GROUND LEASE ELIZABETHTOWNdoc

contracts Cc received these a few minutes ago and have not reviewed them yet This is Reuse Technologies proposal for Coal and Ash Handling Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Johnson Kris ogentrixcom on PM To cc Subject contracts As requested If you have questions please do not hesitate to call BeachENRONdoc v Agreement for Ash Removal Services for Lumberton Powerdoc v Agreement for Ash Removal Services for Elizabethtown Powerdoc Elizabethtown Coal Hauling Agreementdoc Lumberton Coal Hauling Agreement Reviseddoc Kris Johnson BeachENRONdoc v Agreement for Ash Removal Services for Lumberton Powerdoc v Agreement for Ash Removal Services for Elizabethtown Powerdoc Elizabethtown Coal Hauling Agreementdoc Lumberton Coal Hauling Agreement Reviseddoc

Draft Performance Test Guidelines Stoker Plants in North Carolina Cc Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Dan E NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Terri AustinENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Dwight CT Ozzie CT Subject Draft Performance Test Guidelines Stoker Plants in North Carolina Terri The draft guidelines for the test protocol that Ozzie Pagan requested are attached below We probably ought to review them with Jerry Campbell after you review them to see if he can accept them in his OM Agreement This is just a starting point for wording in the Agreement There is no pride of authorship here Dan Forwarded by Dan E WilliamsENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM D Ann NRON AM To Dan E WilliamsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Performance Test Guidelines Here are the corrections

Current Matrix and List of Requests for Cogentrix Cc Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Reagan NRON AM To Glenn NRON Steve Van CT Heather CT Dwight CT Fred CT Ozzie CT cc Subject Current Matrix and List of Requests for Cogentrix Please see attached Thanks Reagan

Re OM Agreement Cc looks fine to me except for I think that since we are not going to purchase the sites that possibility has gone away and we are going to lease the sites we can remove the added language in David Locascio on AM To cc Clark Thompson Subject OM Agreement Dwight Attached is the revised agreement with the changes we discussed Please note that under Capacity Target definition I have put a seperate table for each facility When we produce the seperate actual agreements for the respective facilities I will delete the table for the other facility I am available to discuss at your convenience Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message OPERATION AND MAINTENENCE AGREEMENTdoc
Re Alamac Cc Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM Dwight Beach PM To Gail CT cc Subject Re Alamac This is the latest and greatest

OM agreements Cc you please get this to Jerry Please review And please call me after you have had a chance to review re logistics Forwarded by Dwight BeachHOUECT on PM David Locascio on PM To cc Jay Sonnenberg Subject OM agreements Attached please find both blacklined and execution of the respective OM Agreements for the facilities excluding certain exhibits Jay Sonneburg with Bracewell will be taking the execution copies with him in order to get the LLCs signature when Enron takes control of the LLCs Jay will attach Schedule to each agreement which is a description of the facilities My understanding is that Dwight will be forwarding electronic versions of Schedule Permits and Schedule Budget for both agreements All other schedules are already attached to the agreements themselves Because I will be out of the office most of the day tomorrow in meetings and Jay will have his hands otherwise very full at the closing I would suggest getting with me asap on Tues if any material changes are needed At this point I would not recommend changing any nonmaterial changes I am available today to discuss at your convenience and can be reached at Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message Redline OM AGREEMENT for LUMBERTONdoc Execution Copy of OM AGREEMENT for LUMBERTONdoc Redline OM Agreement for Elizabethtowndoc Execution Copy of OM Agreement for Elizabethtowndoc
Alamac Cc information the Alamac acquisition closed today Kudos to all involved and now the fun part getting them sold within the next days
